original_title: SLBFE signs MoU with Korean shipbuilding industry
original_body_lines: A memorandum of understanding (MoU) was signed between the Sri Lanka Bureau of Foreign Employment (SLBFE), the  Sri Jinaratana Institute affiliated with the Gangaramaya Temple and Korean Cluelife Institute to establish a training center to train Sri Lankan’s for employment in the Korean shipbuilding industry.
The MoU was signed in the presence of Labour and Foreign Employment Minister Manusha Nanayakkara. Pix by Nimalsiri Esirisinghe
